resources.string: Not sufficient space, please delete some buttons and try again.
Are you sure you want to delete the %1$d button (s)?
Please make sure your air conditioner can display current temperature
(If the air conditioner does not support heating, please also tick）
Please check if the Air Conditioning Controller matches the conditions below:
Some air conditioners shut down, the outdoor unit still needs to run for some time, in order to protect your air conditioner, please set the delay time for more than 30 minutes.
When turned on, the air conditioner will automatically turn off the power for a long standby time
Please click the following buttons to check if each function is available.
Infrared code transmission failure, try again?
Sorry, we haven\'t found the code base that matches your air conditioner completely. We have chosen a high-matching code base for you.
Please upload front and back photos of your remote control
Restore to the status of the last shutdown directly after turning on
After turning on, it operates with the maximum fan speed to reduce the temperature to 20 °C for 10 minutes. It then resumes to the previous shutdown temperature.
After turning on, it operates with the maximum fan speed to increase the temperature to 30 °C for 10 minutes. It then resumes to the previous shutdown temperature.
Automatically determine based on room temperature
Turn on the fast-cooling if the temperature is above 30 °C, and the fast-heating if the temperature is below 20 °C.
Turn on fast-cooling or fast-heating depending on the season
Turn off indicator light from 9pm to 9am
Tips: Sleep mode takes effect only after the air conditioner is turned on
Turn off the air conditioner %1$d min later
When turned on, the air conditioner will change the status according to the following settings.
Current account has no password, please enter new password /n
Point the remote control at the Air Conditioning Controller and press the button. The Air Conditioning Controller will record the current status of the air conditioner.
Air conditioning controller is working. Cut off the power may damage the air conditioner. Are you sure to cut off the power?
Since the infrared code of the air conditioner remote control is usually a composite status code, the button of "adding completed" will change all the status of the air conditioner.
Assume that the current air conditioning status is: operating, cooling, 25°C, no swing, low fan speed;

When adding the button, point the air conditioner remote control to the Air Conditioner Controller, press "Temperature +", the Air Conditioner Controller will remember the following status: operating, cooling, 26 °C, no swing, low fan speed;
When the above-mentioned added button is triggered, regardless of the current state of the air conditioner, it will jump directly to the previously remembered air conditioning state.

1. If the blue light blinks continuously, please check if the Wi-Fi network is 2.4 GHz and the router password is correct. \n2. Please make sure the Wi-Fi is connected properly. \n3. Place your phone close to the Hub and make sure your phone and Hub are connected to the same Wi-Fi network.
Error %1$d, accessory not found in the back-end server.

1. Please make sure that the Hub has prompted the “Wi-Fi connected successfully”, which indicates that the Hub is connected to the server. If not prompted, please reset the Hub and try again. \n2. Please make sure that the router is connected to the Internet. \n3. Please make sure the region you login is the same with where you bought the Hub.
Error 624, please re-add the Hub and try again.
Error %1$d. If you still cannot solve it, please contact support@aqara.com.
1. Please place the accessory close to the Hub and avoid obstructions in between.\n2.Please check if the network works properly.
Long press the reset button for more than 5 seconds, until the red indicator light blinks.
To reset, long press the reset button on the Hub for more than 10 seconds, until the yellow indicator light blinks.
No connectable accessory found, please power on and reset the accessory.
Tap to modify name, icon and set homepage display.
Tap to modify name, and set homepage display.
1. Check if the Wi-Fi password is correct. \n2. Place the phone closer to the accessory. \n3. Check if the network works properly.

If the authorization is revoked, the accessory will unlink and clear any data saved by the accessory in the cloud from your current account. Data stored in the physical accessory will need to be erased through a reset.If you wish to reuse the accessory, please link and authorize the accessory again.

1. If you are using a dual band router, please disable the 5 GHz Wi-Fi network.\n2. Please keep your phone close to the Hub and make sure they are connected to the same 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network.

Make sure your phone is connected to 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network.

1. If the blue light blinks continuously, please check if the Wi-Fi network is 2.4 GHz and the router password is correct. 
2. Please make sure the Wi-Fi is connected properly.
3. Please make sure the region you login is the same with where you bought the Hub. 
4. Place your phone close to the Hub and make sure your phone and Hub are connected to the same Wi-Fi network.
5. Please turn off mobile data to improve the success rate.

string-array.name: lock_add_verify_sub_hint
string-array.item: Admin fingerprint or password is required before adding.
Verify admin fingerprint or password first before adding. \n The administrator has the highest authority towards the door lock, please add carefully.
Verify admin fingerprint or password first before adding. Enter the fingerprint with different angles according to instructions to ensure the completeness of the fingerprint.

Enter the fingerprint with different angles according to instructions to ensure the completeness of the fingerprint. \n The administrator has the highest authority towards the door lock, please add carefully.\n Please do not use the finger you often use, such as thumb to make the Admin fingerprint.
